text: (musalamaanon) bhala tum un logon se kyon nahin ladate jinhonne apanee qasamon ko tod daala aur rasool ko nikaal baahar karana (apane dil mein) thaan liya tha aur tumase pahale chhed bhee unhonen hee shuroo kee thee kya tum unase darate ho to agar tum sachche eemaanadaar ho to khuda unase kaheen badh kar tumhaare darane ke qaabil hai
